item.title: Creating a DKMS deb package
item.author: mhcerri at gmail dot com (Marcelo Henrique Cerri)
item.description: All the steps to create a deb package with a DKMS module. It’s assumes a native deb package for simplicity. Preparation Install tools for deb packaging: apt install devscripts dh # TODO check it Install DKMS: apt install dkms Generate a base debian package By default, dkms mkdsc uses the systems directories when creating and building a DKMS package.
